name: OutBreak Zombie
description:
GamePlay: A chilling dark town filled with zombies. How long can you stay alive?

Features:

• Adrenaline: Kill zombies to gain adrenaline. Lose to much and game over.

• Guns: Find them around town, your need lots of guns!

• KillCount: Keeps track of all the zombies killed.

• Time: Keeps track of playtime.

• Spooky: A chilling dark town filled with zombies.

• Flashlight: A must!
